Actually it works perfectly with vista. The only difference is that the license file is stored in the following location rather than xp's:
C:\Users\(username here)\AppData\Roaming\...

etc... once u go to that folder u will see the pegasys folder and from there u can replace the *.lic file with the cracked copy. Enjoy.
